content.raw:
I meanwhile also made an upstream pull request for OGRE: [https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/pull/481](https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/pull/481). So the necessary change (supporting [NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOrder](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/appkit/nsopenglcpsurfaceorder)) should hopefully be merged before too long.

This commit should introduce no new issues building against older OGRE v1.10.x releases (I used v1.10.3 and v1.10.6 before).
content.html:
I meanwhile also made an upstream pull request for OGRE: https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/pull/481. So the necessary change (supporting NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOrder) should hopefully be merged before too long.

This commit should introduce no new issues building against older OGRE v1.10.x releases (I used v1.10.3 and v1.10.6 before).
